Songs of Other Days
Ystalyfera, Neath Port Talbot, Wales, UK March contest - 1st Trebanos, 2nd divided between Tycroes and Ystradgynlais. 3 bands competed.
July 2, 2018, 5:48 a.m. July 2, 2018, 6:59 a.m.

3 Ystradgynlais Public Band R. J. Marke
